snippet: In a survey, 54 percent of deal makers say they believe that 2015 will surpass last year in terms of mergers activity, down from 78 percent last year.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: In a survey, 54 percent of deal makers say they believe that 2015 will surpass last year in terms of mergers activity, down from 78 percent last year.

headline.main: Deal Makers Less Upbeat About M.&.A. Growth
